import React,{useState} from 'react' import './stylesheet/sidebar.css' import { useAuth0 } from '@auth0/auth0-react' export default function Sidebar() { const [navBarState,setNavBarState] = useState(false) const { logout, isAuthenticated } = useAuth0() const data = [ { className:"bx-grid-alt",value:"Dashboard"}, { className:"bx-user",value:"Users"}, { className:"bx-folder",value:"Picture Gallery"}, { className:"bx-bar-chart-alt-2",value:" Gallery"} ] return ( <>
{ setNavBarState(!navBarState)}}>
BBBootstrap
Dashboard Users Picture Gallery Stats
{isAuthenticated ? logout()}> Sign Out : ""}

Main Components

) }
